articles.title: Global stocks sink, gold jumps as US-Iran tensions escalate
articles.description: NEW YORK (AP) — Global stock markets are falling Monday while oil and gold prices are rising as tensions escalate between the U.S. and Iran. Markets have been roiled since Friday after the U.S. killed Iran's top general. The price…
articles.content:
NEW YORK (AP) Stocks fell in early trading on Wall Street Monday and oil prices continued rising as investors worried that tensions between the U.S. and Iran would escalate.
A U.S. airstrike killed a top Iranian general last week and prompted threats of reta… [+2105 chars]

articles.title: Democrat announces run for Kansas 2nd District seat
articles.description: TOPEKA, Kan. (AP) — The Democratic mayor of Topeka has kicked off a campaign to challenge freshman Republican Rep. Steve Watkins.
articles.content:

articles.title: Georgia police: Driver fell asleep at wheel in fatal crash
articles.description: ACWORTH, Ga. (AP) — A Georgia man accused of being behind the wheel during a fatal crash on Sunday morning told police he had fallen asleep while driving, a Cobb County police spokeswoman confirmed.
articles.content:

articles.title: Burlington City Council to consider interim police chief
articles.description: BURLINGTON, Vt. (AP) — The Burlington City Council is scheduled to vote on the appointment of an interim police chief in the aftermath of the resignation of the previous chief, who admitted using a fake Twitter account.

articles.description: THESSALONIKI, Greece (AP) — Three people were arrested on suspicion of involvement in the killing of a Bulgarian soccer fan during an attack by PAOK Thessaloniki supporters, Greek police said Monday.

articles.title: Eggs from endangered sea turtle stolen from Thai beach
articles.description: BANGKOK (AP) — A community in southern Thailand has offered a reward for catching whoever stole dozens of unhatched eggs of an endangered turtle species.
articles.content:
BANGKOK (AP) A community in southern Thailand has offered a reward for catching whoever stole dozens of unhatched eggs of an endangered turtle species.
